title: V
data:
==Controls==
*Pressing the '''v''' key will [[evoke]] your current wielded weapon, if possible.
*Pressing the '''V''' key allows you to evoke appropriate inventory items, such as wands.
*Pressing '''Ctrl-V''' colours monsters in view by HP. The following command will restore normal colouring.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''v''' represents various [[Insubstantial wisp|wisps]] and [[Fire vortex|vortices]].
*'''V''' represents the various [[Vampire (monster)|vampire]]s.
